argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bezout.1 | |- M = { z e. NN | E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) } |
| 2 |  | bezout.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | bezout.4 | |- ( ph -> B e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | bezout.2 | |- G = sup ( M , RR , `' < ) |
| 5 |  | bezout.5 | |- ( ph -> -. ( A = 0 /\ B = 0 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ssrab2 | |- { z e. NN | E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) } C_ NN |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_eqsstri | |- M C_ NN |
| 8 |  | #P_nnuz | |- NN = ( ZZ>= ` 1 ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sseqtri | |- M C_ ( ZZ>= ` 1 ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_bezoutlem1 | |- ( ph -> ( A =/= 0 -> ( abs ` A ) e. M ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ne0i | |- ( ( abs ` A ) e. M -> M =/= (/) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl6 | |- ( ph -> ( A =/= 0 -> M =/= (/) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- { z e. NN | E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) } = { z e. NN | E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) } |
| 14 | 13, 3, 2 | #P_bezoutlem1 | |- ( ph -> ( B =/= 0 -> ( abs ` B ) e. { z e. NN | E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) } ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_rexcom | |- ( E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) <-> E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) ) |
| 16 | 2 | #P_zcnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 18 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( x e. ZZ -> x e. CC ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_ad2antll | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> x e. CC ) |
| 20 | 17, 19 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A x. x ) e. CC ) |
| 21 | 3 | #P_zcnd | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 23 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( y e. ZZ -> y e. CC ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_ad2antrl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> y e. CC ) |
| 25 | 22, 24 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> ( B x. y ) e. CC ) |
| 26 | 20, 25 | #P_addcomd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. ZZ /\ x e. ZZ ) ) -> ( z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) <-> z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_2rexbidva | |- ( ph -> ( E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) <-> E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) ) ) |
| 29 | 15, 28 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) <-> E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_rabbidv | |- ( ph -> { z e. NN | E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ z = ( ( A x. x ) + ( B x. y ) ) } = { z e. NN | E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) } ) |
| 31 | 1, 30 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> M = { z e. NN | E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) } ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( abs ` B ) e. M <-> ( abs ` B ) e. { z e. NN | E. y e. ZZ E. x e. ZZ z = ( ( B x. y ) + ( A x. x ) ) } ) ) |
| 33 | 14, 32 | #P_sylibrd | |- ( ph -> ( B =/= 0 -> ( abs ` B ) e. M ) ) |
| 34 |  | #P_ne0i | |- ( ( abs ` B ) e. M -> M =/= (/) ) |
| 35 | 33, 34 | #P_syl6 | |- ( ph -> ( B =/= 0 -> M =/= (/) ) ) |
| 36 |  | #P_neorian | |- ( ( A =/= 0 \/ B =/= 0 ) <-> -. ( A = 0 /\ B = 0 ) ) |
| 37 | 5, 36 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> ( A =/= 0 \/ B =/= 0 ) ) |
| 38 | 12, 35, 37 | #P_mpjaod | |- ( ph -> M =/= (/) ) |
| 39 |  | #P_infmssuzcl | |- ( ( M C_ ( ZZ>= ` 1 ) /\ M =/= (/) ) -> sup ( M , RR , `' < ) e. M ) |
| 40 | 9, 38, 39 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> sup ( M , RR , `' < ) e. M ) |
| 41 | 4, 40 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> G e. M ) |
